title: CMD Tutorial: How to Hide Folder in Windows Without Software

how to hide folder in windows 7 with command prompt
CMD Tutorial: How to Hide Folder in Windows Without Software
description: This tutorial shows how to hide folders in windows like a PRO. We will use the combination of attrib and cacls command.   [TimeStamps]  STEP 1: Create a folder in system32 STEP 2: Hide it with attrib command STEP 3: Then hide it's content with cacls command STEO 4: Create a .bat file to easily lock and unlock the folder  [Command used in the video]  To hide the folder--  ehco off attrib [folder_name] +h +r +s && cacls folder_name] /e /c /d %username%  To unhide the folder--  echo off cacls  [folder_name] /e /c /g %username%:f && attrib  [folder_name] -h -r -s       [I am social]  Website:   Facebook:   Twitter:    Google plus:
